mapper.insert: insert into api_stat_data ( api_id, start_time, count_total, count_timeout, count_not200, count_200_not0, resptime_average, resptime_0s_1s, resptime_1s_2s, resptime_2s_3s, resptime_3s_4s, resptime_4s_5s, resptime_5s_6s, resptime_6s_7s, resptime_7s_8s, resptime_8s_9s, resptime_10s_11s, resptime_11s_12s, resptime_12s_max ) values ( #{apiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{countTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{countTimeout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{countNot200,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count200Not0,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resptimeAverage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{resptime0s1s,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resptime1s2s,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resptime2s3s,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resptime3s4s,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resptime4s5s,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resptime5s6s,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resptime6s7s,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resptime7s8s,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resptime8s9s,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resptime10s11s,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resptime11s12s,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resptime12sMax,jdbcType=INTEGER})
